Plot: Having exorcised the demons of his ex, Malcolm is starting fresh with his new girlfriend and her two children. After moving into their dream home, however, Malcolm is once again plagued by bizarre paranormal events.
Title: A Haunted House 2
Writer: Marlon Wayans, Rick Alvarez, Marlon Wayans (characters), Rick Alvarez (characters)
Actors: Marlon Wayans, Jaime Pressly, Essence Atkins, Gabriel Iglesias
tomatoConsensus: Sloppy, vulgar, and manic, A Haunted House 2 might be worth a chuckle or two, but mostly it's a string of pop culture references and crude gags that fail to hit their intended targets.
